title: IP issue
body: i currently have 5022 influence points, i have been trying to buy kog' maw for 2 days now the store doesn't register the fact that i have over the amount needed for the purchase. I have tried multiple things such as restarting league of legends, playing more games to see if it was just not registering my last games. But still cant purchase him. If somone could get back to me about this issue i would greatly appreciate it. ( i have also heard this is a way for riot to get you to spend rp and if so, why would they do that and call the game free to play?)

replies.body:
We're aware of this issue and are currently investigating into it. It seems this popped up after the store outage last week. You may be able to work around this by launching back into the Legacy Client from the Login screen:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

If that workaround doesn't work for you, reach out in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll try some things from our end. ^.^

I'm having the same problem, i have 1800 ip but I cannot buy a mystery champion shard.
